alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Kendall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bandera and Kendall Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 844 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kronkosky State Natural Area, or 8 miles southwest of Boerne, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boerne, Interstate 10, Sisterdale, Kreutzberg, Walnut Grove, Kendalia, Welfare, Nelson City, Kronkosky State Natural Area, Waring, Lakehills, Crown and Cascade Caverns. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
